data.name: Presenter Slides™
data.detailed_description:
Presenter Slides™

The premier software choice for enterprise presentations. Visualize your milestones with state of the art patented bar-chart technology. Utilize a vast library of stock photos to showcase how hip your brand is. Report on the productivity of your coworkers with funky visualizations! Ethically developed by an experienced team of outsourced and unpaid interns!

Enterprise Features

  • Build slides.
  • Traverse the local hellscape.
  • Go for a walk in the desert.
  • Get buff, strong and vicious with your personal trainer.
  • Webcam-ready gameplay!
  • Commit office work!
  • Sail around and meet eight-limbed friends.
  • Fight a guy wearing red makeup.

Disclaimer: software license not included.

data.short_description: An unconventional adventure into the corporate world of presentation software. Improve office productivity by 200% and impress your boss while doing it.
data.reviews:
“I "enjoyed" your video game.”
Jen Simpkins, ex-editor of Edge Magazine

“It's good, but not academic enough!”
7/12 – Our thesis examiners

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Additional Notes: A Keyboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Additional Notes: A Webcam
